name: C U Raman
my_business:
ENERGY ENTERPRISES
Established in 2009, ENERGY ENTERPRISES brings over 15 years of experience in water treatment solutions. With roots in ION EXCHANGE (I) LTD, we specialize in RO systems , water softeners, iron removers, multigrade filters, UV, and UF systems. We also provide AMC & ACMC services for complete maintenance support. Trusted for quality and reliability in residential, commercial, and industrial water purification.
top_product: RO Water Purifiers – Domestic & Industrial We specialize in high-quality RO water purifiers and filtration systems designed for pure, safe, and great-tasting drinking water. From compact home RO units to large-capacity industrial RO plants, our products ensure reliable performance, durability, and easy maintenance. With complete sales, service, and spares support, ENERGY ENTERPRISES provides end-to-end water purification solutions tailored to your needs.
ideal_referral: "My ideal referral is anyone using a water purifier — whether at home, in offices, or in industries — who needs RO sales, service, or spares. I also work with builders, facility managers, and businesses that require reliable water purification systems and AMC support."
top_problem_solved: The top problem I solve is hard water and impure water. Many homes and industries struggle with scaling, bad taste, and unsafe water. With our RO systems and water softeners, we ensure pure, safe drinking water and protect equipment from damage caused by hard water.
my_favourite_bni_story: "One of my favourite BNI stories is when a fellow member referred me to a client who urgently needed service for their RO system. Because of BNI, I got connected instantly, solved the customer’s problem the same day, and built a long-term relationship. That single referral turned into repeat business, AMC, and even more referrals. It showed me the true power of BNI networking — trust and growth through genuine connections."

top_problem_solved: A premium client with a massive 10-acre facility faced a critical challenge—tracking how many people enter and exit their premises accurately. This led to security risks, compliance concerns, and operational inefficiencies. At Signup Networks, we delivered the perfect solution: our smart headcounting camera system. It provides real-time footfall tracking, enhances security, and streamlines workforce management—all without manual effort! Now, our client has complete visibility over their premises, ensuring a safer and more efficient operation. If your business is struggling with people tracking and security, let’s connect and explore how our solutions can help!

my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is how it opened my eyes to doing business globally. During COVID, like many of us, I was stuck wondering how to sustain my academy. That’s when BNI connections and learning gave me the courage to launch online classes. What started as a survival move turned into a global opportunity—today we’ve taught students not just across India, but also in the US, UK, Dubai, and beyond. BNI didn’t just give me referrals; it gave me the mindset and network to think beyond boundaries and take Rhythmic Beat Dance Court global.
